perturbation.original_text: 5.   OUTSOURCING OF TRUST SERVICES  INTENTIONALLY OMITTED
perturbation.changed_text: 5. OUTSOURCING OF TRUST SERVICES M&I will provide trust services as outlined in the service level agreement.
perturbation.explanation: This perturbation introduces a contradiction by initially stating that trust services are intentionally omitted, and then later implying that trust services are provided according to a service level agreement that is not included. This could lead to confusion regarding the actual services offered.

perturbation.changed_text: 6.3 Corporate Support Services. M&I will provide corporate support services as typically offered to its customers.
perturbation.explanation: This perturbation introduces a contradiction because the contract initially indicates that corporate support services are intentionally omitted. By then stating M&I will provide corporate support services, this conflicts with the omission and creates uncertainty about whether or not these services are included and the scope of services.

perturbation.changed_text: 7.   FACILITIES MANAGEMENT M&I shall handle facilities management as agreed upon by both parties.
perturbation.explanation: This perturbation introduces a contradiction by initially omitting the discussion of Facilities Management, then implies Facilities Management will be handled as agreed upon by both parties. However, there is no clear indication of what was agreed, or if that agreement exists, creating uncertainty and lack of clarity about facility management responsibilities.
